words.en: Ha Meem

translations.text: Haa-Meeem

words.id: 'Ain Siin Qaaf
words.en: Ayn Seen Qaaf

translations.text: 'Ayyyn-Seeen-Qaaaf

words.id: demikianlah||Dia mewahyukan||kepadamu||dan kepada||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum kamu||Allah||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: Thus||reveals||to you||and to||those||before you||before you||Allah||the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Kazaalika yooheee ilaika Wa-ilal lazeena min qablikal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

words.id: kepunyaan-Nya||apa||di||langit(jamak)||dan apa||di||bumi||dan Dia||Maha Tinggi||Maha Besar
words.en: To Him||(belong) whatever||(is) in||the heavens||and whatever||(is) in||the earth||and He||(is) the Most High||the Most Great

translations.text: Lahoo maa fis samaa-waati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-Huwal Aliyul 'Azeem

words.id: hampir||langit(jamak)||pecah/terbelah||dari||atasnya||dan malaikat||mereka bertasbih||dengan memuji||Tuhan mereka||dan mereka memohonkan ampun||bagi orang||di||bumi||ingatlah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia||Maha Pengampun||Maha penyayang
words.en: Almost||the heavens||break up||from||above them||and the Angels||glorify||(the) praise||(of) their Lord||and ask for forgiveness||for those||on||the earth||Unquestionably||indeed||Allah||He||(is) the Oft-Forgiving||the Most Merciful

translations.text: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna min fawqihinn; walmalaaa'ikatu yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-yastaghfiroona liman fil ard; alaaa innal laaha huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||mengambil||dari||selain Dia||pelindung-pelindung||Allah||Penjaga||atas mereka||dan tidaklah||kamu||atas mereka||pengawal/pengurus
words.en: And those who||take||besides Him||besides Him||protectors||Allah||(is) a Guardian||over them||and not||you||(are) over them||a manager

translations.text: Wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'al laahu hafeezun alaihim Wa-maaa anta alaihim biwakeel

words.id: dan demikian||Kami wahyukan||kepadamu||Al Qur'an||bahasa Arab||supaya kamu memberi peringatan||ibu||kota||dan orang yang||sekelilingnya||dan kamu memberi peringatan||pada hari||berkumpul||tidak ada||keraguan||didalamnya||segolongan||dalam||surga||dan segolongan||dalam||neraka
words.en: And thus||We have revealed||to you||a Quran||(in) Arabic||that you may warn||(the) mother||(of) the towns||and whoever||(is) around it||and warn||(of the) Day||(of) Assembly||(there is) no||doubt||in it||A party||(will be) in||Paradise||and a party||in||the Blazing Fire

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika Qur-aanan Arabiyyal litunzira Ummal Quraa Wa-man hawlahaa Wa-tunzira Yawmal Jam'i laa raiba feeh; fareequn fil jannati Wa-fareequn fis sa'eer

words.id: dan jika||menghendaki||Allah||tentu Dia menjadikan mereka||ummat||satu||akan tetapi||Dia memasukkan||orang yang||Dia kehendaki||ke dalam||rahmat-Nya||dan orang-orang yang zalim||tidaklah||bagi mereka||dari||seorang pelindung||dan tidak||seorang penolong
words.en: And if||Allah willed||Allah willed||He could have made them||a community||one||but||He admits||whom||He wills||in (to)||His Mercy||And the wrongdoers||not||for them||any||protector||and not||any helper

translations.text: Wa-law shaaa'al laahu laja'alahum ummatanw waahi-datanw walaakien yudkhilu maien yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; waz-zaalimoona maa lahum minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer

words.id: atau||mereka mengambil||dari||selain Dia||pelindung-pelindung||maka Allah||Dia||pelindung||dan Dia||menghidupkan||orang-orang yang mati||dan Dia||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha kuasa
words.en: Or||have they taken||besides Him||besides Him||protectors||But Allah||He||(is) the Protector||and He||gives life||(to) the dead||And He||(is) on||every||thing||All-Powerful

translations.text: Amit takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a fallaahu Huwal Waliyyu Wa-Huwa yuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

words.id: dan apa yang||kamu perselisihkan||didalamnya||dari||sesuatu||maka hukumnya||kepada||Allah||demikian itu||Allah||Tuhanku||atas-Nya||aku bertawakkal||dan kepada-Nya||aku kembali
words.en: And whatever||you differ||in it||of||a thing||then its ruling||(is) to||Allah||That||(is) Allah||my Lord||upon Him||I put my trust||and to Him||I turn

translations.text: Wa-makh talaftum feehi min shai'in fahukmuhooo ilal laah; zaalikumul laahu Rabbee alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi uneeb

words.id: pencipta||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||Dia menjadikan||bagi kalian||dari||diri kalian sendiri||berpasang-pasangan||dan dari||binatang ternak||berpasang-pasangan||Dia menjadikan kamu berkembang||padanya||tidak ada||serupa dengan Dia||sesuatu||dan Dia||Maha Mendengar||Maha Melihat
words.en: (The) Creator||(of) the heavens||and the earth||He made||for you||from||yourselves||mates||and among||the cattle||mates||He multiplies you||thereby||(There) is not||like Him||anything||and He||(is) the All-Hearer||the All-Seer

translations.text: Faatirus samaawaati wal-ard; ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw Wa-minal an'aami azwaajai yazra'ukum feeh; laisa kamislihee shai'unw Wa-Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

words.id: bagi-Nya||perbendaharaan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||Dia lapangkan||rezeki||bagi siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia sempitkan||sesungguhnya Dia||dengan segala||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: To Him (belongs)||(the) keys||(of) the heavens||and the earth||He extends||the provision||for whom||He wills||and restricts||Indeed He||of every||thing||(is) All-Knower

translations.text: Lahoo maqaaleedus samaawaati wal-ardi yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; innahoo bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

words.id: Dia mensyari'atkan||bagi kalian||dari pada||agama||apa yang||diwasiatkan||dengannya||Nuh||dan yang||Kami wahyukan||kepadamu||dan apa||yang Kami wasiatkan||dengannya||Ibrahim||dan Musa||dan 'Isa||hendaklah||kamu tegakkan||agama||dan jangan||kamu berpecah belah||didalamnya||amat berat||atas||orang-orang yang musyrik||apa (agama) yang||kamu seru mereka||kepadanya||Allah||Dia memilih||kepadanya||siapa yang||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia memberi petunjuk||kepadanya||siapa||ia kembali
words.en: He has ordained||for you||of||the religion||what||He enjoined||upon||Nuh||and that which||We have revealed||to you||and what||We enjoined||upon||Ibrahim||and Musa||and Isa||To||establish||the religion||and not||be divided||therein||Is difficult||on||the polytheists||what||you call them||to it||Allah||chooses||for Himself||whom||He wills||and guides||to Himself||whoever||turns

translations.text: Shara'a lakum minad deeni maa wassaa bihee Noohanw wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika Wa-maa wassainaa biheee ibraaheema Wa-Moosa Wa-'Eesaaa an aqeemud deena Wa-laa tatafarraqoo feeh; kabura 'alal mushrikeena maa tad'oohum ilaih; Allaahu yajtabee ilaihi mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdeee ilaihi mai yuneeb

words.id: dan tidak||mereka berpecah belah||kecuali||dari||sesudah||apa yang||datang kepada mereka||pengetahuan||kedengkian||diantara mereka||dan kalau tidak||kalimat/ketetapan||telah lewat/lalu||dari||Tuhanmu||sampai pada||waktu||ditentukan||pasti diputuskan||diantara mereka||dan sesunguhnya||orang-orang yang||mereka diwarisi||kitab||dari||sesudah mereka||benar-benar dalam||keragu-raguan||daripadanya||kebimbangan
words.en: And not||they became divided||until||after||after||[what]||came to them||the knowledge||(out of) rivalry||among them||And if not||(for) a word||(that) preceded||from||your Lord||for||a term||specified||surely, it (would have) been settled||between them||And indeed||those who||were made to inherit||the Book||after them||after them||(are) surely in||doubt||concerning it||disquieting

translations.text: Wa-maa tafarraqooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul ilmu baghyam bainahum; Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika ilaaa ajalim musammal laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innal lazeena oorisul Kitaaba mim ba'dihim lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

words.id: maka karena itu||serulah||dan tetaplah||sebagaimana||kamu diperintah||dan janganlah||kamu mengikuti||hawa nafsu mereka||dan katakan||aku beriman||dengan apa yang||menurunkan||Allah||dari||kitab||dan aku diperintah||untuk berbuat adil||diantara kamu||Allah||Tuhan kami||dan Tuhan kamu||bagi kami||amal-amal kami||dan bagi kamu||amal-pamal kamu||tidak ada||pertengkaran||diantara kami||dan diantara kamu||Allah||Dia akan mengumpulkan||diantara kami||dan kepada-Nya||tempat kembali
words.en: So to that||then invite||and stand firm||as||you are commanded||and (do) not||follow||their desires||but say||I believe||in what||Allah has sent down||Allah has sent down||of||(the) Book||and I am commanded||that I do justice||between you||Allah||(is) our Lord||and your Lord||For us||our deeds||and for you||your deeds||(There is) no||argument||between us||and between you||Allah||will assemble||[between] us||and to Him||(is) the final return

translations.text: Falizaalika fad'u wastaqim kamaaa umirta Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum Wa-qul aamantu bimaaa anzalal laahu min Kitaab, Wa-umirtu li-a'dila bainakum Allaahu Rabbunaa Wa-Rabbukum lanaaa a'maa-lunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum laa hujjata bainanaa Wa-baina-kumul laahu yajma'u bainanaa Wa-ilaihil maseer

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||mereka membantah||pada||Allah||dari||sesudah||apa(agama)||diterima||padanya||bantahan mereka||batil/sia-sia||di sisi||Tuhan mereka||dan atas mereka||kemurkaan||dan bagi mereka||azab||sangat keras
words.en: And those who||argue||concerning||Allah||after||after||[what]||response has been made to Him||response has been made to Him||their argument||(is) invalid||with||their Lord||and upon them||(is) wrath||and for them||(is) a punishment||severe

translations.text: Wallazeena yuhaaajjoona fil laahi mim ba'di mas tujeeba lahoo hujjatuhum daahidatun inda Rabbihim Wa-'alaihim ghadabunw Wa-lahum 'azaabun shadeed

words.id: Allah||yang||menurunkan||kitab||dengan kebenaran||dan neraca||dan tidaklah||kamu mengetahui||barangkali||kiamat||dekat
words.en: Allah||(is) the One Who||(has) sent down||the Book||in truth||and the Balance||And what||will make you know||Perhaps||the Hour||(is) near

translations.text: Allahul lazeee anzalal Kitaaba bilhaqqi wal-Meezaan; Wa-ma yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata qareeb

words.id: minta disegerakan||dengannya(kiamat)||orang-orang yang||tidak||mereka beriman||dengannya||dan orang-orang yang||mereka beriman||merasa takut||daripadanya||dan mereka mengetahui||bahwasanya ia(kiamat)||benar||ingatlah||sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||mereka membantah||pada||hari kiamat||benar-benar dalam||kesesatan||jauh
words.en: Seek to hasten||[of] it||those who||(do) not||believe||in it||and those who||believe||(are) fearful||of it||and know||that it||(is) the truth||Unquestionably||indeed||those who||dispute||concerning||the Hour||(are) certainly in||error||far

translations.text: Yasta'jilu bihal lazeena laa yu'minoona bihaa wallazeena aamanoo mushfiqoona minhaa Wa-ya'lamoona annahal haqq; alaaa innal lazeena yumaaroona fis Saa'ati lafee dalaalin ba'eed

words.id: Allah||Maha Lembut||terhadap hamba-hamba-Nya||Dia memberi rezeki||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia||Maha Kuat||Maha Perkasa
words.en: Allah||(is) Subtle||with His slaves||He gives provision||(to) whom||He wills||And He||(is) the All-Strong||the All-Mighty

translations.text: Allahu lateefum bi'ibaadihee yarzuqu maien yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez

words.id: barang siapa||adalah||menghendaki||keuntungan||akhirat||Kami tambahkan||baginya||pada||keuntungan itu||dan barang siapa||adalah||menghendaki||keuntungan||dunia||Kami berikan kepadanya||daripadanya(keuntungan itu)||tidak ada||baginya||di||akhirat||dari||bahagian
words.en: Whoever||is||desiring||(the) harvest||(of) the Hereafter||We increase||for him||in||his harvest||And whoever||is||desiring||(the) harvest||(of) the world||We give him||of it||but not||for him||in||the Hereafter||any||share

translations.text: Man kaana yureedu harsal Aakhirati nazid lahoo fee harsihee Wa-man kaana yureedu harsad dunyaa nu'tihee minhaa Wa-maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min naseeb

words.id: atau||mereka mempunyai||sekutu-sekutu||mereka mensyari'atkan||bagi mereka||daripada||agama||apa-apa||tidak||mengizinkan||dengannya||Allah||dan jika tidak||kalimat/ketetapan||putusan||niscaya diputuskan||diantara mereka||dan sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang zalim||bagi mereka||azab||pedih
words.en: Or||for them||(are) partners||who have ordained||for them||of||the religion||what||not||has given permission||of it||Allah||And if not||(for) a word||decisive||surely, it (would have) been judged||between them||And indeed||the wrongdoers||for them||(is a) punishment||painful

translations.text: Am lahum shurakaaa'u shara'oo lahum minad deeni maa lam ya'zan bihil laah; Wa-law-laa kalimatul fasli laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innaz zaalimeena lahum 'azaabun aleem

words.id: kamu akan melihat||orang-orang yang zalim||mereka ketakutan||karena apa(kejahatan)||mereka kerjakan||dan ia/balasannya||menimpa||pada mereka||dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dan beramal||kebaikan||dalam||taman-taman||surga||bagi mereka||apa yang||mereka kehendaki||di sisi||Tuhan mereka||demikian itu||ia||karunia||besar
words.en: You will see||the wrongdoers||fearful||of what||they earned||and it||(will) befall||[on] them||And those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||(will be) in||flowering meadows||(of) the Gardens||for them||(is) whatever||they wish||with||their Lord||That||it||(is) the Bounty||the Great

translations.text: Taraz zaalimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa kasaboo Wa-huwa waaqi'um bihim; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fee rawdaatil jannaati lahum maa yashaaa'oona inda Rabbihim; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer

words.id: demikian itu||yang||menggembirakan||Allah||hamba-hamba-Nya||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka beramal||kebaikan||katakanlah||tidak||aku minta kepadamu||atasnya||upah||kecuali||kasih sayang||dalam||kekeluargaan||dan barang siapa||mengerjakan||kebaikan||Kami tambahkan||baginya||padanya||kebaikan||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha mensyukuri
words.en: That||(is of) which||Allah gives glad tidings||Allah gives glad tidings||(to) His slaves||those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||Say||Not||I ask you||for it||any payment||except||the love||among||the relatives||And whoever||earns||any good||We increase||for him||therein||good||Indeed||Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||All-Appreciative

translations.text: Zaalikal lazee yubash-shirul laahu ibaadahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaat; qul laaa as'alukum alaihi ajran illal mawaddata fil qurbaa; Wa-mai yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahoo feehaa husnaa; innal laaha Ghafoorun Shakoor

words.id: atau||mereka mengatakan||dia mengada-adakan||terhadap||Allah||dusta||maka jika||menghendaki||Allah||Dia menutup||atas||hatimu||dan menghapuskan||Allah||bathil||dan Dia membenarkan||benar||dengan kalimat-kalimat-Nya||sesungguhnya Dia||Maha Mengetahui||dengan yang ada||dada
words.en: Or||(do) they say||He has invented||about||Allah||a lie||But if||Allah (had) willed||Allah (had) willed||He would seal||[over]||your heart||And Allah eliminates||And Allah eliminates||the falsehood||and establishes||the truth||by His Words||Indeed, He||(is) All-Knowing||of what||(is in) the breasts

translations.text: Am yaqooloonaf tara 'alal laahi kaziban fa-ien yasha' illaahu yakhtim 'alaa qalbik; Wa-yamhul laahul baatila Wa-yuhiqqul haqqa bi-Kalimaatih; innahoo 'Aleemun bizaatis sudoor

words.id: dan Dia||yang||menerima||taubat||dari||hamba-hamba-Nya||dan Dia memaafkan||dari||kesalahan-kesalahan||dan Dia mengetahui||apa yang||kamu kerjakan
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||accepts||the repentance||of||His slaves||and pardons||[of]||the evil||and He knows||what||you do

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee yaqbalut tawbata 'an ibaadihee Wa-ya'foo anis saiyiaati Wa-ya'lamu maa taf'aloon

words.id: dan Dia memperkenankan||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan beramal||kebaikan||dan Dia menambah mereka||dari||karunia-Nya||dan orang-orang kafir||bagi mereka||azab||sangat keras
words.en: And He answers||those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||and increases (for) them||from||His Bounty||And the disbelievers||for them||(will be) a punishment||severe

translations.text: Wa-yastajeebul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati Wa-yazeeduhum min fadlih; wal-kaafiroona lahum 'azaabun shadeed

words.id: dan jika||melapangkan||Allah||rezeki||bagi hamba-hamba-Nya||tentu mereka akan melampaui batas||di muka||bumi||tetapi||Dia menurunkan||dengan ketentuan/ukuran||apa yang||Dia kehendaki||sesungguhnya||terhadap hamba-hamba-Nya||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Melihat
words.en: And if||Allah extends||Allah extends||the provision||for His slaves||surely they would rebel||in||the earth||but||He sends down||in (due) measure||what||He wills||Indeed, He||of His slaves||(is) All-Aware||All-Seer

translations.text: Wa-law basatal laahur rizqa li'ibaadihee labaghaw fil ardi Wa-laakiny yunazzilu biqadarim maa yashaaa'; innahoo bi'ibaadihee Khabeerun Baseer

words.id: dan Dia||yang||menurunkan||hujan||dari||sesudah||apa||mereka berputus asa||dan Dia menyebarkan||rahmat-Nya||dan Dia||Maha Pelindung||Maha Terpuji
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||sends down||the rain||after||after||[what]||they have despaired||and spreads||His mercy||And He||(is) the Protector||the Praiseworthy

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee yunazzilul ghaisa min ba'di maa qanatoo Wa-yanshuru rahmatah; Wa-Huwal Waliyyul Hameed

words.id: dan diantara||tanda-tanda-Nya||ciptaan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan apa yang||bertebaran||pada keduanya||dari||makhluk melata||dan Dia||atas||mengumpulkan mereka||apabila||Dia menghendaki||Maha Kuasa
words.en: And among||His Signs||(is the) creation||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and whatever||He has dispersed||in both of them||of||(the) creatures||And He||(is) over||their gathering||when||He wills||All-Powerful

translations.text: Wa-min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bassa feehimaa min daaabbah; Wa-Huwa 'alaa jam'ihim izaa yashaaa'u Qadeer

words.id: dan apa yang||menimpa kamu||dari suatu||musibah||maka disebabkan||perbuatan||tangan-tanganmu||dan Dia memaafkan||dari||kebanyakan
words.en: And whatever||befalls you||of||(the) misfortune||(is because) of what||have earned||your hands||But He pardons||[from]||much

translations.text: Wa-maaa asaabakum min museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum Wa-ya'foo 'an kaseer

words.id: dan tidaklah||kamu||dengan melepaskan||di||bumi||dan tidak ada||bagi kalian||dari||selain||Allah||dari||seorang pelindung||dan tidak||seorang penolong
words.en: And not||you||(can) escape||in||the earth||and not||for you||besides||besides||Allah||any||protector||and not||any helper

translations.text: Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw Wa-liyyinw Wa-laa naseer

words.id: dan dari||tanda-tanda-Nya||kapal-kapal||di||laut||seperti gunung-gunung
words.en: And among||His Signs||(are) the ships||in||the sea||like [the] mountains

translations.text: Wa-min Aayaatihil jawaari fil bahri kal-a'lam

words.id: jika||Dia menghendaki||Dia menenangkan||angin||maka jadilah ia kapal-kapal)||terhenti||atas||permukaan||sesungguhnya||pada yang||demikian itu||benar-benar tanda-tanda||bagi setiap||orang yang bersabar||orang yang bersyukur
words.en: If||He wills||(He) can cause to become still||the wind||then they would remain||motionless||on||its back||Indeed||in||that||surely (are) Signs||for everyone||patient||(and) grateful

translations.text: iny yashaaa yuskinir reeha fa-yazlalna rawaakida 'alaa zahrihi; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

words.id: atau||Dia membinasakannya||dengan sebab||perbuatan mereka||dan Dia memberi maaf||dari||kebanyakan
words.en: Or||He could destroy them||for what||they have earned||but He pardons||[from]||much

translations.text: Aw yoobiqhunna bimaa kasaboo Wa-ya'fu 'an kaseer

words.id: dan mengetahui||orang-orang yang||mereka membantah||pada||ayat-ayat Kami||tidak ada||bagi mereka||dari||tempat lari
words.en: And may know||those who||dispute||concerning||Our Signs||(that) not||for them||any||place of refuge

translations.text: Wa-ya'lamal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatinaa maa lahum min mahees

words.id: maka apa yang||diberikan kepadamu||dari||sesuatu||maka kesenangan||kehidupan||dunia||dan apa yang||di sisi||Allah||lebih baik||dan lebih kekal||bagi orang-orang yang||beriman||dan kepada||Tuhan mereka||mereka bertawakkal
words.en: So whatever||you are given||of||a thing||(is) but a passing enjoyment||(for) the life||(of) the world||But what||(is) with||Allah||(is) better||and more lasting||for those who||believe||and upon||their Lord||put (their) trust

translations.text: Famaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-maa indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa lillazeena aamanoo Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||mereka menjauhi||besar||dosa||dan perbuatan keji||dan apabila||apa-apa||marah||mereka||mereka mengampuni
words.en: And those who||avoid||(the) greater||sins||and the immoralities||and when||and when||they are angry||they||forgive

translations.text: Wallazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi wal-fawaahisha Wa-izaa maa ghadiboo hum yaghfiroon

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||mereka memperkenankan||kepada Tuhan mereka||dan mereka mendirikan||sholat||dan urusan mereka||musyawarah||diantara mereka||dan sebagian apa||Kami beri rezeki mereka||mereka menafkahkan
words.en: And those who||respond||to their Lord||and establish||prayer||and their affairs||(are conducted by) consultation||among them||and from what||We have provided them||they spend

translations.text: Wallazeenas tajaaboo li-Rabbihim Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-amruhum shooraa bainahum Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||apabila||menimpa mereka||kezaliman||mereka||mereka membela diri
words.en: And those who||when||strikes them||tyranny||they||defend themselves

translations.text: Wallazeena izaa asaabahumul baghyu hum yantasiroon

words.id: dan balasan||kejahatan||kejahatan||serupa dengannya||maka barang siapa||memaafkan||dan berbuat baik||maka pahalanya||atas||Allah||sesungguhnya Dia||tidak||menyukai||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: (The) recompense||(of) an evil||(is) an evil||like it||But whoever||pardons||and makes reconciliation||then his reward||(is) on||Allah||Indeed He||(does) not||like||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Wa-jazaaa'u saiyi'atin saiyi'atum misluha faman 'afaa Wa-aslaha fa-ajruhoo 'alal laah; innahoo laa yuhibbuz zaalimeen

words.id: dan sungguh orang-orang||menolong/membela diri||sesudah||teraniayanya||maka mereka itu||tidak ada||atas mereka||dari||jalan
words.en: And surely whosoever||defends himself||after||he has been wronged||then those||not||(is) against them||any||way

translations.text: Wa-lamanin tasara ba'da zulmihee fa-ulaaa'ika maa alaihim min sabeel

words.id: sesungguhnya hanyalah||jalan||atas||orang-orang yang||zalim||manusia||dan mereka melampaui batas||di muka||bumi||dengan tanpa||kebenaran||mereka itu||bagi mereka||azab||pedih
words.en: Only||the way||against||those who||oppress||the people||and rebel||in||the earth||without||right||Those||for them||(is) a punishment||painful

translations.text: innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yazlimoonan naasa Wa-yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem

words.id: dan sungguh orang||dia sabar||dan dia memaafkan||sesungguhnya||demikian itu||benar-benar termasuk||teguh hati||urusan
words.en: And whoever||(is) patient||and forgives||indeed||that||(is) surely of||matters of determination||matters of determination

translations.text: Wa-laman sabara Wa-ghafara inna zaalika lamin azmil umoor

words.id: dan barang siapa||menyesatkan||Allah||maka tidak ada||baginya||dari||seorang pelindung||dari||sesudah itu||dan kamu akan melihat||orang-orang yang zalim||ketika||mereka melihat||azab||mereka berkata||apakah||untuk||kembali||dari||jalan
words.en: And whoever||Allah lets go astray||Allah lets go astray||then not||for him||any||protector||after Him||after Him||And you will see||the wrongdoers||when||they see||the punishment||saying||Is||(there) for||return||any||way

translations.text: Wa-maien yudli lillaahu famaa lahoo minw waliyyin min ba'dih; Wa-taraz zaalimeena lammaa ra-awul 'azaaba yaqooloona hal ilaa maraddin min sabeel

words.id: dan kamu akan melihat||mereka dihadapkan||atasnya(neraka)||keadaan tunduk||dari pada||rendah/hina||mereka melihat||dari||pandangan mata||tersembunyi||dan berkata||orang-orang yang||beriman||sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang merugi||orang-orang yang||mereka merugi||diri mereka||dan keluarga mereka||pada hari||kiamat||ingatlah||sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang zalim||dalam||azab||kekal
words.en: And you will see them||being exposed||to it||humbled||by||disgrace||looking||with||a glance||stealthy||And will say||those who||believed||Indeed||the losers||(are) those who||lost||themselves||and their families||(on the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||Unquestionably!||Indeed||the wrongdoers||(are) in||a punishment||lasting

translations.text: Wa-taraahum yu'radoona alaihaa khaashi'eena minaz zulli yanzuroona min tarfin khafiyy; Wa-qaalal lazeena aamanooo innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-ahleehim Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa innaz zaalimeena fee azaabin muqeem

words.id: dan tidak||adalah||bagi mereka||dari||pelindung-pelindung||menolong mereka||dari||selain||Allah||dan barang siapa||menyesatkan||Allah||maka tidak ada||baginya||dari||jalan
words.en: And not||will be||for them||any||protector||(who) will help them||besides||besides||Allah||And whom||Allah lets go astray||Allah lets go astray||then not||for him||any||way

translations.text: Wa-maa kaana lahum min awliyaaa'a yansuroonahum min doonil laah; Wa-mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min sabeel

words.id: perkenankanlah||bagi Tuhanmu||dari||sebelum||bahwa||akan datang||suatu hari||tidak||di tolak||padanya||dari||Allah||tidak ada||bagi kalian||dari||tempat berlindung||pada hari itu||dan tidak ada||bagi kalian||dari||mengingkari
words.en: Respond||to your Lord||before||before||[that]||comes||a Day||(there is) no||averting||for it||from||Allah||Not||(is) for you||any||refuge||(on) that Day||and not||for you||any||denial

translations.text: istajeeboo li-Rabbikum min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo min Allah; maa lakum min malja'-ien yawma'izinw Wa-maa lakum min nakeer

words.id: maka jika||mereka berpaling||maka tidak||Kami mengutus kamu||atas mereka||penjaga||tidaklah||atasmu||kecuali||penyampaian||dan sesungguhnya Kami||apabila||Kami merasakan||manusia||dari Kami||rahmat||dia gembira||karenanya||dan jika||menimpa mereka||kesusahan||dengan sebab||perbuatan||tangan-tangan mereka||maka sesungguhnya||manusia||sangat ingkar
words.en: Then if||they turn away||then not||We have sent you||over them||(as) a guardian||Not||(is) on you||except||the conveyance||And indeed||when||We cause to taste||[the] man||from Us||Mercy||he rejoices||in it||But if||befalls them||evil||for what||have sent forth||their hands||then indeed||[the] man||(is) ungrateful

translations.text: Fa-in a'radoo famaaa arsalnaaka alaihim hafeezan in alaika illal balaagh; Wa-innaaa izaaa azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan fariha bihaa Wa-in tusibhum saiyi'atun bimaa qaddamat aydeehim fa-innal insaana kafoor

words.id: bagi Allah||kerajaan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||Dia menciptakan||apa yang||Dia kehendaki||Dia memberi||kepada siapa||Dia kehendaki||anak perempuan||dan Dia memberi||kepada siapa||Dia kehendaki||anak laki-laki
words.en: To Allah||(belongs the) dominion||(of) the heavens||and the earth||He creates||what||He wills||He grants||to whom||He wills||females||and He grants||to whom||He wills||[the] males

translations.text: Lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; yahabu limai yashaaa'u inaasanw Wa-yahabu limai yashaaa'uz zukoor

words.id: atau||Dia menjodohkan mereka||laki-laki||dan perempuan||dan Dia menjadikan||siapa||Dia kehendaki||mandul||sesungguhnya Dia||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Kuasa
words.en: Or||He grants them||males||and females||and He makes||whom||He wills||barren||Indeed He||(is) All-Knower||All-Powerful

translations.text: Aw yuzawwijuhum zukraananw Wa-inaasanw Wa-yaj'alu mai yashaaa'u 'aqeemaa; innahoo 'Aleemun Qadeer

words.id: dan tidak||ada||bagi seorang manusia||bahwa||berkata dengannya||Allah||kecuali||wahyu||atau||dari||belakang||tabir||atau||mengutus||utusan||lalu diwahyukan||dengan idzin-Nya||apa yang||Dia kehendaki||sesungguhnya Dia||Maha Tinggi||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: And not||is||for any human||that||Allah should speak to him||Allah should speak to him||except||(by) revelation||or||from||behind||a veil||or||(by) sending||a Messenger||then he reveals||by His permission||what||He wills||Indeed, He||(is) Most High||Most Wise

translations.text: Wa-maa kaana libasharin aien yukallimahul laahu illaa wahyan aw minw waraaa'i hijaabin aw yursila Rasoolan fa-yoohiya bi-iznihee maa yashaaa'; innahoo Aliyyun Hakeem

words.id: dan demikianlah||Kami wahyukan||kepadamu||roh/Al Qur'an||dari||urusan Kami||tidaklah||kamu adalah||kamu mengetahui||apakah||Al kitab||dan tidak||iman||akan tetapi||Kami jadikannya||cahaya||Kami beri petunjuk||dengannya||siapa||Kami kehendaki||dari||hamba-hamba Kami||dan sesungguhnya kamu||benar-benar kamu memberi petunjuk||kepada||jalan||yang lurus
words.en: And thus||We have revealed||to you||an inspiration||by||Our Command||Not||did you||know||what||the Book (is)||and not||the faith||But||We have made it||a light||We guide||with it||whom||We will||of||Our slaves||And indeed you||surely guide||to||(the) path||straight

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika roohan min amrinaa; maa kunta tadree mal Kitaabu Wa-lal eemaanu Wa-laakin ja'alnaahu nooran nahdee bihee man nashaaa'u min ibaadinaa; Wa-innaka latahdeee ilaaa Siraatin Mustaqeem

words.id: jalan||Allah||yang||kepunyaan-Nya||segala apa yang||di||langit(jamak)||dan segala apa yang||di||bumi||ingatlah||kepada||Allah||kembali||segala urusan
words.en: (The) path||(of) Allah||the One||to Whom||(belongs) whatever||(is) in||the heavens||and whatever||(is) in||the earth||Unquestionably||To||Allah||reach||all affairs

translations.text: Siraatil laahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; alaaa ilal laahi taseerul umoor
